name: That Moment At Night
description:
Do you ever wish to escape? That Moment at Night is short fully-voiced, interactive fiction game. You are driving back after a long day, as it is a far commute you can help but letting your mind wander as you contemplate life.

This game is in beta, any feedback would be appreciated!

Credits

(itch.io)(twitter)(instagram)

(website)

Jess Grommet - Composer

(itch.io)

Victoria Macdonald- Voice Actor

(instagram)

Controls [A] and [D] to move lanes

[W] to brake [F] to adjust radio [Esc] to pause/resume [Space] to advance memories
